name: Arckuk Sauce
description: Various mods to replace and enhance the standard HUD. Power/HR/cadence/draft/gradient and speed/time/distance mods. Also live power curve and power for duration charts.
author: Nick Keat

windows.name: Arckuk Event Title
windows.description: Simple mod to show the Event Title

windows.name: Arckuk Top Bar
windows.description: Replacement for default Zwift Speed, Distance, Elevation, Time bar

windows.name: Arckuk Power Cadence HR
windows.description: Replacement for default Zwift Power, Cadence and HR box

windows.name: Arckuk Power Curve
windows.description: Show your current and peak power curve for a current activity

windows.name: Arckuk Input
windows.description: Shows inputs (Power, Cadence, HR, Draft, Gradient) that govern rider speed

windows.name: Arckuk Output
windows.description: Shows output (speed, distance, time, elevation) for this session
